# Resume builder

Build your resume with only Markdown and JSON.
If you wish more customization you can use `css`.

## A Python cli-tool


## News {#an-id}

* Support for [fontawesome](https://fontawesome.com/) icons
  in URL and logo entries.
* ...

## Other identifier {#a-secondid}

A bit of text
